home.tagline: Design system and well-tested programs evangelist
home.presentation:
I love Web and all related technologies. I love the W3C, TC39, WhatWG, all JS frameworks (React, Vue.js, Node.js, Angular, ...) and vanilla because they allow me to learn everyday.

Share my passion for web craftsmanship is an important part of my developer job (Meetup, Courses, Conferences, training interns).

Long live to the Web, the JS and the Craftsmanship !
